facebookAccount.userAgent: Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 12; M2102J20SG) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/101.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36
facebookAccount.notes: Time the system automatically retrieves new cookies from email/password, unit is minute. If you set null, the system will not automatically retrieve new cookies. Recommended: 1440 (1 day) or 4320 (3 days). TO USE THIS FEATURE, ENTER THE ACCOUNT PASSWORD ABOVE.

notesLanguage: Change to your language with ISO 639-1 code. Available: vi (Vietnamese), en (English)

whiteListMode.notes: If enabled, only IDs in whiteListIds can use the bot.

whiteListModeThread.notes: If enabled, only threads in whiteListThreadIds can use the bot.
whiteListModeThread.how_it_work: If both whiteListMode and whiteListModeThread are enabled, system checks user in whiteListIds first, then thread in whiteListThreadIds. If one condition is true, the user can use the bot.

database.notes: 1) Type: 'json', 'sqlite', 'mongodb'. For MongoDB, enter URI in uriMongodb. Recommended: 'mongodb' or 'sqlite'. 2) autoSyncWhenStart=true slows bot start. 3) autoRefreshThreadInfoFirstTime=true refreshes thread info on first message.

autoRestart.notes: Set interval in milliseconds or cron. Examples: 1000, 10000, 60000, 3600000, 86400000, 0 0 * * *. Docs: https://www.npmjs.com/package/node-cron. Set 0, false, or null to disable auto restart.

autoUptime.notes: timeInterval in seconds. url is where requests are sent (auto detected for Glitch or Replit).

autoLoadScripts.notes: Automatically load scripts on change. Separate multiple ignored commands/events by comma or space, e.g., 'cmd1.js cmd2.js cmd3.js'.

restartListenMqtt.notes: Values in milliseconds. Don't edit if unsure.

notiWhenListenMqttError.notes: Message sent when MQTT server stops due to account issues. Enable=true to use.

gmail.note: Bot uses gmailAccount to send email. Separate multiple emails by space or comma.

telegram.note: Separate multiple chat IDs by space or comma.

discordHook.note: Separate multiple webhook URLs by space or comma.
